CustomField.description: number fields are: Amount__c, Net_Amount__c, Application_Fee__c, Stripe_Fee__c, Partial_Amount__c, Retained_Net_Amount__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If A Parent field is set on the Transaction, this field is checked by packaged code any time: A Number field on the Transaction ISCHANGED Transaction Status ISCHANGED Payment Status ISCHANGED
